description: <p>We have an exciting opportunity in our Rotherham clinic for a healthcare assistant who wants to make a difference in our patient’s lives. You will provide patient care according to Diaverum procedures and in order to increase the quality of life for our patients. A comprehensive professional training programme will be provided to you, including on-the-job training, e-learning and access to our in-house education programme ‘d Academy’.<br /><br />RESPONISIBILITIES:<br />• To support the nursing team and undertake duties as directed by a registered nurse<br />• To escort patients to and from the clinical area to the waiting areas or transport<br />• To serve patient drinks and snacks during treatment as required<br />• To undertake basic health checks with patients pre and post dialysis including weight and blood pressure<br />• To check and clean equipment following appropriate training<br />• To assist with patient documentation as appropriate<br />• To prepare, restore and maintain areas and equipment for clinical treatments, ensuring that supplies and machines are readily available.<br />• Act as an assigned member of staff for a group of patients ensuring ‘great care‘ is provided at all times<br />• Proactively participate in quality and service improvement programmes<br /><br />REQUIREMENTS:<br />• Must be educated to GCSE level or equivalent<br />• Minimum NVQ level 2 in Health; Social Care or equivalent and working towards level 3 <br />• Ideally previous experience in hospital and healthcare setting<br />• Ability to work effectively independently as well as in a team<br />• Have a positive and dynamic approach to providing safe and effective delivery of care<br />• Excellent communication skills (oral + written) with fluency in English<br /><br />COME GROW WITH US!<br />• Part time - 22-24 hours per week<br />• Monday to Saturday, Shifts hours from 06.30 to 23.30 (No Nights* or Sunday working)<br />• Competitive Salary<br />• 27 days annual leave (plus Bank Holidays) increasing with service<br />• Life Assurance, Discounted Fitness Membership, Stakeholder Company Pension<br />• Relocation allowance *<br />• Post subject to References, Identification, DBS, OH checks<br />* where applicable/dependent on clinic<br /><br />Please note that we reserve the right to close vacancies prior to the advertised closing date when we are in receipt of sufficient applications.</p>
title: Healthcare Assistant (part-time)
